participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys quiet moments and has a strong connection with family.
participant_1.background: I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake. I take my mother chocolate milk shakes when I visit her in the hospital. I am a house wife who loves my cat Cow. i am not afraid to die. i play soccer professionally.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and creative, often seeks out new experiences and values personal freedom.
participant_2.background: I wonder what kind of treasures I will find on my next walk in the woods. i hate my parents, but i love my job. I began whittling and traveling the country in my car. I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies. I love eating McDonald's french fries, but I never tell my parents because they think they are unhealthy.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do during rainy days?
I love to organize my office supplies!
Interesting! I never thought of that. I love to read during rainy days.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read mystery novels and science fiction books.
I've never been a big reader, but I've heard good things about mystery novels!
They're really great! I always like trying to figure out who the killer is before the end of the book.
That sounds fun! I'll have to give them a try sometime.
You should! They're a great way to pass the time on a rainy day.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you do for a living?
I'm a lawyer.
Oh wow! That must be a lot of work.
It is, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine! What's your favorite part of your job?
I love helping people and making a difference in their lives.
That's so great! I bet you're a great lawyer.
Thanks! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you have a very interesting life.
I do! I'm always up for new adventures.
I'm the same way! I love trying new things.
That's awesome! I'm sure we'll get along great.
I think so too
